name: ukokesmart
0:
”Alexa, set the Air-Condition temperature to 25 degrees.”
”Alexa, decrease the Air-Condition temperature.”
”Alexa, increase the Air-Condition temperature.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Voices control either cooling or heating your room or office, it is up to 400SQF. You are eligible to control the fan speed,dehumidifying, and swing. If you ask Alexa to change he temperate without specifying by how much, the default setting will either up or down temperature by 1℉
